snippet.title: Vicious Circle RTX Gameplay Trailer | Rooster Teeth Trailers
snippet.description:
Available soon on Steam from Rooster Teeth Games! Vicious Circle is an uncooperative multiplayer shooter in which four mercenaries compete for loot against a terrifying monster who wants to kill them. Dirty tricks are the key to victory, and only one player can come out on top.

» Vicious Circle on Steam: http://bit.ly/viciouscircleonsteam

» Get your Rooster Teeth merch: http://bit.ly/29dfbRM
» Subscribe: http://bit.ly/RT_Trailers

About Rooster Teeth Trailers:
Welcome to the official Rooster Teeth Trailers channel! Subscribe now for trailers, behind-the-scenes features, interviews, and more from all your favorite Rooster Teeth shows. Like what you see here? Subscribe to Rooster Teeth FIRST to watch all our exclusive content.

» Twitch // https://www.twitch.tv/roosterteeth
